name: UICKeyChainStore
summary: UICKeyChainStore is a simple wrapper for Keychain that works on iOS and OS X. Makes using Keychain APIs as easy as NSUserDefaults.
description:
UICKeyChainStore is a simple Swift wrapper for Keychain that works on iOS and OS X.
                            Makes using Keychain APIs as easy as NSUserDefaults.

                            Features
                              - Simple interface
                              - Support access group
                              - [Support accessibility](#accessibility)
                              - [Support iCloud sharing](#icloud_sharing)
                              - **[Support TouchID and Keychain integration (iOS 8+)](#touch_id_integration)**
                              - Works on both iOS & OS X
